tutorials.title: AngularJS Tutorial
tutorials.author: Jakob Jenkov
tutorials.description: A highly detailed, code dense tutorial with something for beginners and those already up to speed with Angular.

tutorials.title: Learn AngularJS With These 5 Practical Examples
tutorials.author: JMartin Angelov
tutorials.description: A cool guide on how to implement 5 popular webpage features you've probably seen before!

tutorials.title: AngularJS CRUD application demo
tutorials.author: angular-app
tutorials.description: Straight Outta' Github CRUD app demo using Angular.

tutorials.title: AngularJS Tutorial - Building a Web App in 5 minutes
tutorials.author: Nick Kaye
tutorials.description: A great Angular tutorial for when you're sitting there waiting to do the next activity, but you're a Millenial so you have to be constantly occupied by electronics and you also like Angular.

tutorials.title: A Step-by-Step Guide to Your First AngularJS App
tutorials.author: Raoni Boaventura
tutorials.description: A quick guide on getting a nice looking table webapp up and running in short order.

tutorials.title: Angularjs -- Workshop
tutorials.author: Santiago Esteva
tutorials.description: A wide array of Angular tutorials and concepts, but also some new Angular 2.0 goodness.

tutorials.title: AngularJS in 20ish Minutes
tutorials.author: Dan Wahlin
tutorials.description: AngularJS in 20 minutes!  What!  If you like videos, this is the Angular guide for you, folks.

tutorials.title: Introduction to AngularJS
tutorials.author: Microsoft Virtual Academy
tutorials.description: A free - am I reading this correctly - AngularJS intro from Microsoft.
